channel.description: Recent content in gis on coletl

item.title: Approximate Geocoding
item.description: This tutorial outlines methods of record linkage specialized to the context of spatial data. We use these techniques to assign geographic coordinates to all Kenyan polling stations from 1997 to 2013. Through a generalizable example of this automated geocoding process, we provide what we hope to be a helpful introduction to rigorous, systematic record linkage in the world of messy spatial data.
